Name: [Energy] Scarlet Noble Special
Desc: Launching an EX Special Attack increases the Agent's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> for 30s, stacking up to 5 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
Desc2: Scarlet Noble of a random flavor. You never know what flavor you have bought until after you drink it. There's supposedly a 0.01% chance of getting the secret flavor: blood.
